title: Cache value of numel in THTensor.
body_html:
I did this simply by changing all of the call sites which could
access size mutably. To make sure this was durable, I cranked up
privacy on THTensor (friending the functions I audited) and
made THTensor_getSizePtr/getStridePtr const-correct, to prove that
no one was modifying sizes/strides via this pointer. (Actually,
strides don't really matter for numel caching, but it's nice
to be symmetric.)

Signed-off-by: Edward Z. Yang ezyang@fb.com
